title: Enterprise Account Executive

questions.description: Current city and state where you reside.
questions.label: Location
What is your legal first name?
What is your legal last name?
What is your preferred first name?
How did you initially hear about this job?
If you chose Algolia Employee, Conference / Event / Career Fair, or Other, please specify here:
Do you have at least 4-5+ years of closing experience (not including BDR experience)?
Do you have experience selling an API product to a technical persona (developers/ CTOs)?
Please share your average deal size, the largest deal you've closed, as well as annual quota.
Are you legally authorized to work in the UK without visa sponsorship now or in the future?
Are you based in London (or nearby) and able to work out of Algolia's London office 2 days per week? (Hybrid-remote)
